definitions.definition: The act of irritating or annoying .
examples: What irritation causes you to be so moody?

definitions.definition: A thing or person that annoys .
A state of inflammation or of painful reaction to cell or tissue damage .
A condition of morbid excitability or oversensitiveness of an organ or part of the body ; a state in which the application of ordinary stimuli produces pain or excessive or vitiated action .

main_definition: The act of irritating or annoying .
secondary_definitions: A thing or person that annoys .
( physiology ) A state of inflammation or of painful reaction to cell or tissue damage .
A condition of morbid excitability or oversensitiveness of an organ or part of the body ; a state in which the application of ordinary stimuli produces pain or excessive or vitiated action .
